about_the_game:
LET'S GO ROOKIE!

Step into the boots of Jax, a rookie in the legendary 'Star Gunners' squadron. When your team vanishes over an uncharted planet, shot down by a mysterious enemy, all you have is their distress signal. Now, it's your chance to prove yourself. Embark on an explosive, bullet-hell adventure through a vibrant, interconnected world full of exploration and danger.

SAVE YOUR SQUAD!

Battle through intense dungeons to rescue your teammates and claim their powerful Star Gunner abilities! Glide on water, wield a laser samurai sword, unleash super strength, and more as you unlock tougher areas. Explore lush alien fields, neon crystal caves, and thorny swamps in your epic adventure!

COMBAT CARNAGE!

Classic twin stick combat with a growing roster of powerups and upgrades. Use your skills to dash through dangerous encounters or use your shield to defend against the onslaught. Swift and responsive controls for both newcomers and veterans alike.

UPGRADES!

Rescue captives and use their skills to build facilities that enhance your adventure! Upgrade stats, expand power-ups, and increase rocket count. To upgrade everything, earn big by keeping your multiplier high and dominating the battlefield!

RETRO FLAVOUR!

Journey back to the golden era of action-packed 90s cartoons with an adventure that captures the magic of retro classics. Inspired by our nostalgia for the N64 and PS1 days, this game blends hand-painted artistry with that unmistakable 90s attitude, wrapping you in a warm, familiar glow. We cherish those past adventures, so here's one crafted with love for the future!

Star Gunners is still in early development and subject to changes. We are excited to share more as development progresses. Please be sure to wishlist and follow Star Gunners for updates or join the Creature Cauldron Discord.

name: Star Gunners

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (or higher)
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5-2.7 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) Integrated Graphics - Lowest Tested so far was HD Graphics 530
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: Subject to change - As we go through development we will refine this.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Star Gunners is a high-energy, action-packed adventure set in a vibrant alien world. Battle through monster-filled environments, unlock abilities, and explore new areas. Can you save your fallen squad? Experience a hand-painted, retro-inspired adventure with modern twists!
